function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient dissemination of the empowerment approach to government decision-makers","Impact":"Limited adoption of the new strategy, leading to unchanged organizational culture and practices","Mitigation":"Develop a comprehensive communication plan to convey the benefits of the empowerment approach to decision-makers","Technologies":"Communication tools, stakeholder engagement platforms","People":"Government decision-makers, national vector control staff","Owner":"Program managers, communication specialists"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of empowerment principles","Impact":"Resistance to organizational change at the management level","Mitigation":"Provide detailed training and resources on the principles and implications of the empowerment approach","Technologies":"Training materials, interactive workshops","People":"Management level personnel","Owner":"HR and training departments"},{"Description":"Resistance to organizational change at the management level","Impact":"Limited implementation of participatory intervention designs and community-based interventions","Mitigation":"Implement change management processes and strategies, provide support and resources for management level personnel","Technologies":"Change management software, organizational development tools","People":"Management level personnel, national planners, policymakers","Owner":"HR, organizational development teams"}]}
